name: Countess Julia's Cameo
affix: Prevent all Arcane damage taken and heal yourself for 25% of the amount prevented.

name: Dovu Energy Trap
affix: Increases duration of Stun effects by 25%.

name: Golden Gorget of Leoric
affix: After earning a massacre bonus, 6 Skeletons are summoned to fight by your side for 10 seconds

name: Kymbo's Gold
affix: Picking up gold heals you for an amount equal to the gold that was picked up.

name: Mara's Kaleidoscope
affix: Prevent all Poison damage taken and heal yourself for 15% of the amount prevented.

name: Moonlight Ward
affix: Hitting an enemy within 15 yards has a chance to ward you with shards of Arcane energy that explode when enemies get close, dealing 320% weapon damage as Arcane to enemies within 15 yards.

name: Overwhelming Desire
affix: Chance on hit to charm the enemy. While charmed, the enemy takes 35% more damage

name: Rakoff's Glass of Life
affix: Enemies you kill have a 4% additional chance to drop a health globe.

name: Talisman of Aranoch
affix: Prevent all Cold damage taken and heal yourself for 15% of the amount prevented.

name: The Ess of Johan
affix: Chance on hit to pull in enemies toward your target and Slow them by 80%.

name: The Star of Azkaranth
affix: Prevent all Fire damage taken and heal yourself for 15% of the amount prevented.

name: Xephirian Amulet
affix: Prevent all Lightning damage taken and heal yourself for 15% of the amount prevented.

name: Arcstone
affix: Lightning pulses periodically between all wearers of this item, dealing 1500% weapon damage.

name: Avarice Band
affix: Each time you pick up gold, increase your Gold and Health Pickup radius by 1 yard for 10 seconds, stacking up to 30 times

name: Band of Hollow Whispers
affix: This ring occasionally haunts nearby enemies.

name: Band of the Rue Chambers
affix: Your Spirit Generators generate 50% more Spirit.

name: Broken Promises
affix: After 5 consecutive non-critical hits, your chance to critically hit is increased to 100% for 3seconds.

name: Bul'Kathos's Wedding Band
affix: You drain life from enemies around you.

name: Convention of Elements
affix: Gain 200% increased damage to a single element for 4 seconds. This effect rotates through the elements available to your class in the following order: Arcane, Cold, Fire, Holy, Lightning, Physical, Poison.

name: Eternal Union
affix: Increases the duration of Phalanx avatars by 200%.

name: Halo of Arlyse
affix: Your Ice Armor now reduces damage from melee attacks by 60% and automatically casts Frost Nova whenever you take 10% of your Life in damage.

name: Hellfire Ring
affix: Chance on hit to engulf the ground in lava, dealing 200% weapon damage per second for 6 seconds.

name: Krede's Flame
affix: Taking Fire damage restores your primary resource.

name: Nagelring
affix: Summons a Fallen Lunatic to your side every 10 seconds.

name: Obsidian Ring of the Zodiac
affix: Reduce the remaining cooldown of one of your skills by 1 seconds when you hit with a resource-spending attack.

name: Oculus Ring
affix: Chance to create an area of focused power on killing a monster. Damage is increased by 40% while standing in the area.

name: Pandemonium Loop
affix: Enemies slain while Feared die in a bloody explosion for 800% weapon damage and cause other nearby enemies to flee in Fear

name: Puzzle Ring
affix: Summon a treasure goblin who picks up normal-quality items for you. After picking up 12 items, he drops a rare item with a chance for a legendary.

name: Rechel's Ring of Larceny
affix: Gain 60% increased movement speed for 4 seconds after Fearing an enemy.

name: Ring of Royal Grandeur
affix: Reduces the number of items needed for set bonuses by 1 (to a minimum of 2).

name: Rogar's Huge Stone
affix: Increase your Life per Second by up to 100% based on your missing Life.

name: Skull Grasp
affix: Increase the damage of Whirlwind by 400% weapon damage.

name: The Short Man's Finger
affix: Gargantuan instead summons three smaller gargantuans each more powerful than before.

name: The Tall Man's Finger
affix: Zombie Dogs instead summons a single gargantuan dog with more damage and health than all other dogs combined.

name: Unity
affix: All damage taken is split between wearers of this item.

name: Wyrdward
affix: Lightning damage has a 35% chance to Stun for 1.5 seconds.
